alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 21 at 11:21PM MDT until June 21 at 11:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL EL PASO AND NORTH CENTRAL PUEBLO COUNTIES... At 1121 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fountain to 10 miles southwest of Hanover to near Pinon, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Northern Pueblo, Fountain, Pueblo West, Hanover, Pinon and Security-Widefield. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
